forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 22C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 72F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early, becoming a steady, soaking rain later in the day with a few rumbles of thunder possible. High 19C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning will become a steadier rain in the afternoon with a rumble of thunder possible. High 66F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 65F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.
